response.overview: Wild And Crazy I love the idea of Anything But Cloth party. This over the top, Animal House style party is definitely on my personal top ten Dare dorm submissions of ALL TIME... Anyways, the idea was to have a party where you can wear anything you want, except cloth. We get to see some pretty creative arrangements by the guys, and some super hot and revealing ones from the girls. From cones on the tits, a la Madonna, to a bikini made from duct tape on roller skates, to bubble wrap, to caution tape, to you name it!! Once the girls started kissing each other, that's when the party went from awesome,to legendary... These two girls jump on this dudes rod, while another chick is blowing the hell out of this other guy. All of you guys have to check this movie out. Tell your friends about it. I know I am.
response.tagline: Dorm Room Parties You Won't Believe!
response.title: Dare Dorm 9
